name: VIBRATOR SIMULATOR
detailed_description:
18+

This simulator will turn your gamepad into a full-fledged vibrator. Vibrator - a thing that emits vibrations.

Always wanted a vibrator, but shy to buy? Ordered from the Internet, but ashamed to go to get in the post office?
Vibrators too expensive?
Vibrator Simulator comes to the rescue
I do not guess how you will usse it, but a lot of options.

-Massage. Different power and vibration patterns.

- Morse code (there is a translator from English to Morse code),

-There is an alarm clock and timer.
You set the time, and the gamepad starts frantically. A half-valued replacement for an alarm clock, and more powerful than any smartphone.

- Application options are limited only by your imagination. You can put it next to people and through remote control through a simulator, or on an alarm clock through the alarm clock, it will begin to vibrate like hell, frightening them.

-Minigames in 3d world that create vibrations

This simulator is equipped with various music and beautiful 3D landscapes for maximum relaxation.
You can put the game on manual control, and explore the 3D world of relaxation on your own.
In addition to controlling the vibration through the interface, vibrations can be obtained from within the game world.
The world is divided into different zones of vibration, you can easily move through it, experiencing different vibrations in each zone.

short_description: Turn your gamepad into a massaging device. No need to spend money on expensive stuff anymore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
